name: Battlelog Mobile for Windows Phone
body:
# Description
Battlelog Mobile retrieves your real time [Battlefield 3](http://www.battlefield.com/battlefield3) soldier information from EA / DICE Battlelog server to your Windows Phone. You are able to track your progression in easy, intuitive manner with lots of images and charts. Get yours from [Microsoft Marketplace](http://windowsphone.com/s?appid=003ef672-e898-4564-8799-7bd258060cc0), for free.

All three platforms are supported (PC, PS3, XBox). 

Battlelog Mobile is a open source project it it has nothing to do with official EA / DICE Battlefield 3 or Battlelog products. Project page can be find [right here](https://github.com/mikkoviitala/battlelogmobile).

# Status
Version 1.5.0.0 is available for download from Marketplace and version 1.6.0.0 is in certification process, fixing issues raised by Armored Kill DLC release. 
See the [Issue Tracker](https://github.com/mikkoviitala/battlelogmobile/issues) 
if you want to know what is being developed for next release. You are also welcome to contact us via email or Battlelog.

# Contact
* [battlelogmobile@inbox.com](mailto:battlelogmobile@inbox.com)
* [Mustavuori](http://battlelog.battlefield.com/bf3/user/Mustavuori/) @ Battlelog
* [Battlelog Mobile for Windows Phone](http://www.facebook.com/BattlelogMobile) on Facebook
